alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 5:21PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN GRADY AND THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EST... At 521 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomasville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Cairo, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Enon, Everett, Merrillville, Chastain, Quality, Akridge, Grady Co A/p, Moncrief, Patten, Eason, and Spence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for Big Bend Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.
